Made of layers upon layers of bronze, it is heavy and cumbersome, though the protection it provides is comparable to that of iron. When struck, the bronze reverberates like a bell, transferring violent vibrations to the attacker.

'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Plate armor}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Upgrades

###### Note: Heavy Rebound / Constant Rebound and Bronze Juggernaut / Burnished Joints are mutually exclusive.

<!--Name:Recipe_Constant_Heavy_Rebound-->
{{Pe2craftmod|
|mod  ={{pe2mod|87dfa0e5-83c4-4f0a-856d-1b91dff8f1a1}}

}}

## Trivia

* The Patinated Plate is the most expensive piece of armor in the game.
